title: All That She Wants By Olivia Thorne
description:
For fans of the Billionaire's Seduction series - here's Lily and Connor's first encounter, from Connor's point of view!

This is a special edition for fans. If you haven't read the series yet, you should probably start with All That He Wants (Part 1 The Billionaire's Seduction).

Meet Connor Templeton. He's a billionaire, a ruthless businessman... and he's been having a terrible year.

That all changes when he goes behind enemy lines one night and meets Lily Ross, a secretary with the smarts and sensuality to bring Connor to his knees.

Now Connor has a choice to make: keep his heart closed and stick strictly to business... or put it all on the line for a night he'll never forget?
